I cannot reproduce the bug on my testing system 🙈

After merging, @marienfressinaud please update demo.freshrss.org . I was finding the bug there.

> I cannot reproduce the bug on my testing system

Try to clear your cookies

Thanks. Now I can reproduce it.
And the fix looks fine.
Of possible note that you can still distinguish between the page `Error 403 - Forbidden: Login is invalid` and the notification `Login is invalid` (= account exists).
Yes Frenzie, it could be an improvement to make that more fuzzy
I'm not sure if you still need the demo to be updated, but it is now :)

> I'm not sure if you still need the demo to be updated, but it is now :)

`Error during context user init!` when I opened the demo

:/

Indeed, the reset script wasn't working anymore because the "demo" user wasn't deleted properly (fixed in https://github.com/FreshRSS/xExtension-Demo/commit/031510ecf3e0a420237163fa5624373db0fe78e1). The demo should work now.
